backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing a static business profile and a list of inquiries with methods to submit and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two image‑replacement frontend tasks and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose and styling updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining color tokens, radii, and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA layout composing header, all sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, navigation shortcuts, social icons, and branding attribution.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryForm: Inquiry form handling submission, validation, and success/error UI states.
frontend/src/components/site/ProductCard: Reusable card component displaying a product image, name, and description.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper component that renders a section with optional background and styling.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Renders the About section with company description and feature cards highlighting strengths.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Displays contact information, business hours, and an inquiry form using business profile data.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Hero banner with background image, company headline, and buttons that scroll to contact or products.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Mi: Shows the mission statement and value cards emphasizing quality and global connections.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Pr: Lists featured spice products using ProductCard components within a styled section.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Qu: Highlights export quality points and displays key stats about the company’s reliability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, and handling login flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching a business profile and submitting inquiries through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, typography, and premium component utility classes for the site's theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme values using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, image requirements, and architectural notes for the spice exporter website.
